languages.text: "Отправим на Даргонус ткача с наставлением. Посмотрим, насколько они тверды в вере".
languages.translation_comment: Надо завести этюд, чтобы отразить этот выбор в Dargonus_Part_5
Надо завести этюд, чтобы отразить этот выбор в Dargonus_Part_5

languages.text: "We will send a spinner to Dargonus bearing guidance. Let us see how firm they are in their belief."
languages.original_text: "Отправим на Даргонус ткача с наставлением. Посмотрим, насколько они тверды в вере".

traits.locale_text: "We will send a weaver to Dargonus bearing admonition. Let us see how firm they are in their belief."
"We will send a weaver to Dargonus bearing admonition. Let us see how firm they are in their belief."
"We will send a spinner to Dargonus bearing admonition. Let us see how firm they are in their belief."
"We will send a spinner to Dargonus bearing admonition. Let us see how firm they are in their belief."
"We will send a spinner to Dargonus bearing guidance. Let us see how firm they are in their belief."
"We will send a spinner to Dargonus bearing guidance. Let us see how firm they are in their belief."

languages.text: "Wir schicken einen Spinner mit Anweisungen nach Dargonus. Finden wir heraus, wie fest sie in ihrem Glauben sind."
languages.original_text: "We will send a spinner to Dargonus bearing guidance. Let us see how firm they are in their belief."

traits.locale_text: "Wir schicken einen Spinner mit Anweisungen nach Dargonus. Finden wir heraus, wie fest sie in ihrem Glauben sind."

languages.text: « Nous allons envoyer sur Dargonus un tisseur chargé de guider les fidèles. Nous verrons bien à quel point leurs convictions sont solides. »
languages.original_text: "We will send a spinner to Dargonus bearing guidance. Let us see how firm they are in their belief."

traits.locale_text: « Nous allons envoyer sur Dargonus un tisseur chargé de guider les fidèles. Nous verrons bien à quel point leurs convictions sont solides. »

languages.text: «Enviaremos un tejedor a Dargonus para que haga de guía. Veamos lo firme que es su fe».
languages.original_text: "We will send a spinner to Dargonus bearing guidance. Let us see how firm they are in their belief."

traits.locale_text: «Enviaremos un tejedor a Dargonus para que haga de guía. Veamos lo firme que es su fe».

languages.text: 「我々はダルゴナスに導きを伝えるスピナーを派遣しよう。連中の信念がどれだけ固いかを見せてもらおうじゃないか」
languages.original_text: "We will send a spinner to Dargonus bearing guidance. Let us see how firm they are in their belief."

traits.locale_text: 「我々はダルゴナスに導きを伝えるスピナーを派遣しよう。連中の信念がどれだけ固いかを見せてもらおうじゃないか」

languages.text: “我们可以派遣一名织网者前往达戈努斯进行指导，让我们看看他们的信仰有多坚定。”
languages.original_text: "We will send a spinner to Dargonus bearing guidance. Let us see how firm they are in their belief."

traits.locale_text: “我们可以派遣一名织网者前往达戈努斯进行指导，让我们看看他们的信仰有多坚定。”

languages.text: "Dargonus'a rehberlik etmesi için bir dokur göndereceğiz. İnançlarının ne kadar güçlü olduğunu göreceğiz."
languages.original_text: "We will send a spinner to Dargonus bearing guidance. Let us see how firm they are in their belief."
